item.title: 数据显示，投资者在经济低迷时买入华丽 7 ETF
item.description: 周三的数据显示，在最近美国股市大跌期间，个人投资者抢购了与 "华丽七雄 "科技大盘股挂钩的交易所交易基金的股票。【原文：Individual investors snapped up shares of an exchange-traded fund tied to the "Magnificent Seven" group of technology megacap stocks during the recent nosedive in the U.S. stock market, according to data on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道贸易组织称美国食品巨头百事可乐和康瑞格拉寻求豁免部分进口商品关税
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封信，包括桂格燕麦和福尔杰咖啡在内的主要包装食品制造商要求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普有针对性地豁免可可和水果等进口商品的关税。【原文：Major packaged food makers including Quaker Oats and Folgers coffee asked U.S. President Donald J. Trump for targeted exemptions from tariffs on imports like cocoa and fruit, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 交易日：华尔街终于反弹了。但能持续多久？
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 激进投资者以气候风险和收益不佳为由，反对伍德赛德公司董事选举
item.description: 澳大利亚企业责任中心（ACCR）周四对伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）即将举行的年度股东大会上的所有董事选举表示反对，理由之一是该公司在管理气候风险方面存在失误。【原文：The Australasian Centre for Corporate Responsibility (ACCR) expressed dissent on Thursday against all directors due for election at the upcoming annual general meeting of Woodside Energy , citing failures in managing climate risks, among other reasons.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会撤回推迟亚马逊因裁员而受审的申请
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）周三推翻了其一名律师在法庭上的说法，即需要推迟对亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）消费者保护案的审理，此前该委员会曾以削减成本措施导致 "资源严重不足 "为由推迟审理。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Wednesday reversed one of its lawyer's statements in court that it needed to delay the trial in its consumer protection case against Amazon.com , after earlier citing "severe resource shortfalls" caused by cost cutting measures.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 美国风能和太阳能开发仍有很大发展空间，微软高管称可用于数据中心
item.description: 微软能源副总裁鲍比-霍利斯（Bobby Hollis）周三在休斯敦举行的CERAWeek能源会议上告诉路透社记者，美国的风能和太阳能开发仍有很大的扩展空间，可以为数据中心提供电力，特别是在中西部风能走廊和阳光充足的西南部地区。【原文：U.S. wind and solar development still has significant room for expansion to power data centers, particularly in the Midwest wind corridor and sunny southwest, Microsoft VP of Energy Bobby Hollis told Reuters at the CERAWeek energy conference in Houston on Wednesday.】

item.title: DHL 集团首席执行官：尽管美国采取关税政策，全球贸易仍将增长
item.description: 德国 DHL 集团首席执行官托比亚斯-迈耶（Tobias Meyer）周三告诉路透社记者，随着全球对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策作出反应，全球贸易预计将增长，尽管增长不那么强劲。【原文：Global trade is forecast to grow, albeit less robustly, as the world reacts to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies, Germany's DHL Group CEO Tobias Meyer told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 人工智能、液化天然气需求将使美国天然气使用量持续创历史新高，但瓶颈问题仍是威胁所在
item.description: 在本周举行的一次会议上，高管们表示，由于液化天然气（LNG）需求和数据中心耗电量的飙升，美国天然气使用量将继续创下历史新高，同时他们也警告说，基础设施的缺乏可能会对该行业造成损害。【原文：U.S. natural gas use is set to continue hitting record highs due to soaring liquefied natural gas (LNG) demand and power consumption from data centers, executives said at a conference this week, while also warning a lack of infrastructure could hurt the industry.】

item.title: CEERAWEEK 美国石油高管下周将与特朗普会晤
item.description: 美国石油协会（American Petroleum Institute）周三表示，美国石油生产商将于下周与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统会面。【原文：U.S. oil producers will meet with President Donald Trump next week, leading industry group the American Petroleum Institute said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 精神航空公司完成财务重组，退出破产保护程序
item.description: 精神航空母公司精神航空控股公司（Spirit Aviation Holdings）周三表示，这家低成本航空公司已成功完成财务重组。【原文：Spirit Airlines parent Spirit Aviation Holdings said on Wednesday that the low-cost carrier has successfully completed its financial restructuring.】

item.title: SentinelOne 预测年收入低于华尔街预期
item.description: SentinelOne 周三预测的年收入低于华尔街预期，受到激烈竞争和经济不确定性导致企业支出疲软的影响。【原文：SentinelOne forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, hurt by tough competition and softer enterprise spending due to economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：宝马将承担墨西哥产 3 系轿车的关税成本
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，德国汽车制造商宝马公司（BMW）正告知美国经销商，至少在未来几周内，该公司将承担从墨西哥进口的新关税所带来的额外成本。【原文：German automaker BMW is telling dealers in the U.S. it will absorb the added cost of new tariffs on its imports from Mexico, at least for the next several weeks, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国芯片制造商英特尔任命陈立武为首席执行官
item.description: 陷入困境的美国芯片制造商英特尔（Intel）周三任命前董事会成员陈立武（Lip-Bu Tan）从 3 月 18 日起担任公司首席执行官，这是在英特尔赶走公司资深人士帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）两个多月后任命的。【原文：Struggling U.S. chipmaker Intel on Wednesday named former board member Lip-Bu Tan as its CEO effective March 18, more than two months after the it ousted company veteran Pat Gelsinger.】

item.title: CERAweek：人工智能助推美国电力行业并购丰收年
item.description: 交易商预计，2025 年将是美国电力行业并购的丰收年，因为该行业正准备满足数据中心对人工智能的大规模需求增长，对资产的需求十分旺盛。【原文：Dealmakers expect 2025 to be a bumper year for mergers and acquisitions in the U.S. power industry, with a voracious appetite for assets as the sector gears up to meet massive demand growth from data centers for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Adobe 第一季度营收超出预期
item.description: 本周三，Adobe 第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，得益于其拥有人工智能功能的设计产品组合支出强劲。【原文：Adobe beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Wednesday, benefiting from strong spending on its portfolio of design products that boast artificial intelligence features.】

item.title: 由于 2025 年消费起步缓慢，American Eagle 的年度收入低于预期
item.description: 美国鹰服装公司（American Eagle Outfitters）周三预测全年收入低于预期，与其他美国主要服装制造商一样，预计需求将放缓，因为购物者可能再次面临预算压力。【原文：American Eagle Outfitters forecast annual revenue below expectations on Wednesday, joining other major U.S. apparel makers that expect a demand slowdown as shoppers battle the likelihood of pressured budgets again.】

item.title: Roomba 制造商 iRobot 曾是亚马逊的收购目标，但目前面临持续经营风险
item.description: Roomba 真空吸尘器制造商 iRobot 公司曾是亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）斥资 14 亿美元收购的目标，周三该公司的持续经营能力引起了人们的关注。【原文：Roomba vacuum cleaner maker iRobot , a former $1.4 billion buyout target of Amazon.com , raised concerns on Wednesday about its ability to stay in business.】

item.title: 北美咖啡业在贸易战中寻求答案
item.description: 北美咖啡市场参与者正在寻求澄清美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府挑起的贸易战如何影响他们在整个地区的业务，因为这些地区的业务高度关联。【原文：North American coffee market participants are seeking clarity on how the trade war started by the administration of U.S. President Donald Trump impacts their businesses across the region, where operations are highly interconnected.】

item.title: 路透社/益普索民意调查显示，许多美国人认为特朗普的经济行动过于反复无常
item.description: 路透社/益普索（Reuters/Ipsos）周三结束的一项民意调查显示，约有57%的美国人认为唐纳德-特朗普总统在动摇美国经济的举措上过于反复无常，包括他对进口产品征税的激进策略令股市受到惊吓。【原文：Some 57% of Americans think President Donald Trump is being too erratic in his moves to shake up the U.S. economy, including his aggressive strategy to tax imports that has spooked the stock market, a Reuters/Ipsos poll that closed on Wednesday found.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：特朗普领导的联邦贸易委员会推进对微软的广泛反垄断调查
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）正在继续对微软公司进行反垄断调查。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is moving ahead with an antitrust probe of Microsoft that was opened in the waning days of the Biden administration, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 白宫顾问预计美国第一季度国内生产总值至少增长 2% 至 2.5%
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）周三告诉福克斯新闻（Fox News），他预计美国第一季度的国内生产总值增长率 "至少 "为 2% 至 2.5%。【原文：White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett told Fox News on Wednesday that he expected U.S. gross domestic product growth to be "at least" 2% to 2.5% in the first quarter.】

item.title: 特朗普政府开始努力推翻美国环保署的汽车法规
item.description: 美国环境保护局（U.S. Environmental Protection Agency）周三表示，该局正着手推翻拜登政府的汽车尾气排放规定，该规定将迫使汽车制造商生产越来越多的电动汽车。【原文：The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency said on Wednesday it is beginning the effort to reverse the Biden administration's vehicle emissions rules that would force automakers to build a rising number of electric vehicles.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华平投资和 KKR 正在洽谈收购医疗包装制造商 Gerresheimer
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，由华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）和 KKR 组成的财团正在洽谈收购德国医疗包装制造商 Gerresheimer AG。【原文：A consortium consisting of Warburg Pincus and KKR are in talks to acquire German medical packaging maker Gerresheimer AG , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普上任首月美国预算赤字达 3,070 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周三表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统上任后的第一个完整月里，美国预算赤字总额为 3070 亿美元，比一年前增长了 4%，即 110 亿美元，尽管收入的增长速度超过了支出的增长速度。【原文：The U.S. budget deficit totaled $307 billion for President Donald Trump's first full month in office, up 4%, or $11 billion, from a year ago, the Treasury Department said on Wednesday, even as growth in receipts outpaced that of spending.】

item.title: 消息人士称，拉塔姆航空公司正在谈判，最快将于 7 月终止与 Voepass 的协议
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的人士透露，拉美航空正在寻求最早于今年下半年终止与巴西地区航空公司 Voepass 的代码共享协议。【原文：LATAM Airlines is seeking to terminate its codeshare agreement with Brazilian regional carrier Voepass as early as the second half of this year, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）继承人弗雷德里克-阿诺特（Frederic Arnault）将掌管 Loro Piana，退出钟表部门
item.description: 全球最大的奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）董事长兼首席执行官伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）的五个子女之一弗雷德里克-阿诺特（Frederic Arnault）周三发表声明称，他将于今年 6 月出任该集团旗下高端意大利羊绒品牌 Loro Piana 的首席执行官。【原文：Frederic Arnault, one of the five children of LVMH chairman and CEO Bernard Arnault, will become chief executive of the group's high-end Italian cashmere label Loro Piana in June, the world's biggest luxury group said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 行业组织称欧盟对美国谷物征收关税将打击畜牧业
item.description: 欧盟行业协会FEFAC周三表示，作为欧盟对华盛顿征收钢铝关税的反击措施之一，欧盟对美国谷物征收关税将损害依赖进口动物饲料的欧洲畜牧业。【原文：European Union tariffs on U.S. grains, as part of the bloc's riposte to Washington's levies on steel and aluminium, would hurt a European livestock sector reliant on imports for animal feed, industry association FEFAC said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 土耳其将与美国大陆资源公司合作开发页岩油田
item.description: 土耳其能源部长阿尔帕斯兰-巴伊拉克塔尔（Alparslan Bayraktar）周三在社交媒体平台X上表示，土耳其国家石油公司TPAO已与美国石油生产商大陆资源公司（Continental Resources）签署了一项合资协议，将在该国迪亚巴克尔盆地开发页岩油田。【原文：Turkish national oil company TPAO has signed a joint venture agreement with U.S. oil producer Continental Resources to develop shale fields in the country’s Diyarbakir Basin, Turkish Energy Minister Alparslan Bayraktar said on social media platform X on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普警告欧盟征收报复性关税，称爱尔兰税收政策吸引美国企业
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三誓言要回应欧盟的威胁，即在特朗普对进口钢铁和铝实施全面关税后，欧盟将从下月起对价值260亿欧元（280亿美元）的美国商品征收反关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday vowed to respond to the European Union's threat to impose counter tariffs on 26 billion euros ($28 billion) worth of U.S. goods from next month after Trump implemented blanket tariffs on steel and aluminum imports.】

item.title: 特朗普警告欧盟征收报复性关税，称爱尔兰税收政策吸引美国企业
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三誓言要回应欧盟的威胁，即在特朗普对进口钢铁和铝实施全面关税后，欧盟将从下月起对价值260亿欧元（280亿美元）的美国商品征收反关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday vowed to respond to the European Union's threat to impose counter tariffs on 26 billion euros ($28 billion) worth of U.S. goods from next month after Trump implemented blanket tariffs on steel and aluminum imports.】
